text: Andrzej Bogdan Cofalik is a weightlifter from Poland. He won the Bronze medal in the 83 kg in the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta. == References == Category:Polish male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of Poland Category:Weightlifters at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rybnik County Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics
title: Andrzej Cofalik
